meanings.definition: A small brush with a long handle used for cleaning teeth.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new toothbrush yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I use a toothbrush to clean my teeth.
meanings.sent3: The toothbrush danced around the sink, eager to clean some teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a toothbrush, gleaming with cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The toothbrush bristles tickled my gums as I brushed my teeth.

meanings.definition: To clean teeth with a toothbrush.
meanings.sent1: She will toothbrush her teeth before bed.
meanings.sent2: Remember to toothbrush after every meal.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to toothbrush its teeth with a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a toothbrush, scrubbing away the lies.
meanings.sent5: I toothbrushed vigorously, making sure to reach every tooth.
